sect1.title: Installing FreeBSD and OpenBSD Ports
sect1.para: Firewall Builder consists of two ports: /usr/ports/security/libfwbuilder and /usr/ports/security/fwbuilder. Once both ports are updated (which typically takes two to three weeks after the package is released), simply install the port as usual using portinstall or issuing the "make install" command in /usr/ports/security/fwbuilder.
